description: This file defines an API wrapper object 'InvoiceApi' for interacting with an invoice management backend. It includes methods to list, get, create, update, delete invoices, handle attachments, process payments, and send reminders. It makes use of an imported 'http' module for HTTP requests.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a list of invoices with optional query parameters.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves details of a specific invoice by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new invoice with provided data.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing invoice identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: pdf
methods.description: Downloads the PDF version of an invoice as a blob.

methods.name: uploadAttachment
methods.description: Uploads a file as an attachment to a specific invoice.

methods.name: listAttachments
methods.description: Lists all attachments associated with an invoice.

methods.name: downloadAttachment
methods.description: Downloads a specific attachment as a blob.

methods.name: removeAttachment
methods.description: Removes an attachment from an invoice.

methods.name: addPayment
methods.description: Adds a payment record to an invoice.

methods.name: sendReminder
methods.description: Sends a reminder for an invoice, either real or test.
